osvSchema.details: An issue was discovered in the Cargo extension in MediaWiki before 1.35.14, 1.36.x through 1.39.x before 1.39.6, and 1.40.x before 1.40.2. The Special:Drilldown page allows XSS via artist, album, and position parameters because of applied filter values in drilldown/CargoAppliedFilter.php.

description_data.value: An issue was discovered in the Cargo extension in MediaWiki before 1.35.14, 1.36.x through 1.39.x before 1.39.6, and 1.40.x before 1.40.2. The Special:Drilldown page allows XSS via artist, album, and position parameters because of applied filter values in drilldown/CargoAppliedFilter.php.

descriptions.value: An issue was discovered in the Cargo extension in MediaWiki before 1.35.14, 1.36.x through 1.39.x before 1.39.6, and 1.40.x before 1.40.2. The Special:Drilldown page allows XSS via artist, album, and position parameters because of applied filter values in drilldown/CargoAppliedFilter.php.

Se descubrió un problema en la extensión Cargo en MediaWiki antes de 1.35.14, 1.36.x hasta 1.39.x antes de 1.39.6 y 1.40.x antes de 1.40.2. La página Special:Drilldown permite XSS a través de los parámetros artist, album y position debido a los valores de filtro aplicados en drilldown/CargoAppliedFilter.php.
